entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 March 2023
